MAX_CHECK_PERIOD

private static final int MAX_CHECK_PERIOD
The maximal check period, in milliseconds.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CHECKS_PER_EXECUTION

private static final int CHECKS_PER_EXECUTION
The number of checks per execution. Example: If the timeout is set to 1000ms and the number of checks to 10, then the period between each checks would be 100ms, thus the maximal error would be 100ms and the maximum execution time would be in [1000 ; 1100] milliseconds.

See Also:
